metadata.name: Windows Shell/Scripting Application File Write to Suspicious Folder
metadata.comment: Detects Windows shells and scripting applications that write files to suspicious folders

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 3 AND ((endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\bash.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\cmd.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\cscript.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\msbuild.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\pwsh.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\sh.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\wscript.exe'))) AND (startswith(lower(file.path), lower('c:\\\\perflogs\\\\')) OR startswith(lower(file.path), lower('c:\\\\users\\\\public\\\\'))) OR (endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\certutil.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\forfiles.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\mshta.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\schtasks.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\scriptrunner.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\wmic.exe'))) AND (contains(lower(file.path), lower('c:\\\\perflogs\\\\')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('c:\\\\users\\\\public\\\\')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\temp\\\\')))))

output.summary: Detects Windows shells and scripting applications that write files to suspicious folders

metadata.objective: False positive: Unknown Reference: Internal Research
